name: stirling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a council area (= an area with its own local government) in central Scotland: The chef Nick Nairn was born in Stirling, Scotland.
a city in the area of Stirling in central Scotland
More examplesFewer examplesThere is a statue of Robert the Bruce at Borestone in Stirling.She was raised with two sisters and two brothers in Stirling. Kenny's from Stirling, where the Wallace Monument was built to commemorate William Wallace.Stirling Council has backed plans for an 18-hole golf course.
